name: SILENT SCREAM
description:
SILENT SCREAM is a Junji Ito, HP Lovecraft-inspired Stealth Cooking game where a fast-food restaurant worker sacrifices their customers to an otherworldly entity with the help of The Gatekeeper.

CAPTURE & SACRIFICE CUSTOMERS TO THE ENTITY


BUY MYSTERIOUS ITEMS FROM THE GATEKEEPER

COOK, PREPARE, PACKAGE & DELIVER FOODS
